game.title: The Lost Tome
game.objective: Retrieve the lost tome from the ancient ruins.
game.description: The ancient tome, known as the Book of Wisdom, holds secrets and knowledge of great importance. It was last seen in the ruins of the Old Empire, now a dangerous and desolate place. The Council of Mages has tasked you with retrieving the tome before it falls into the wrong hands.
game.reward: The Book of Wisdom and 1000 gold pieces.

task.objective: Travel to the Old Empire ruins in the Cursed Lands.
task.description: The ruins of the Old Empire are located in the Cursed Lands, a dangerous and desolate region. Be prepared to face the horrors that dwell there.

task.objective: Find the secret entrance to the underground chamber.
task.description: The tome is hidden in an underground chamber beneath the ruins. The entrance is well-hidden, so you will need to search carefully.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian of the tome and retrieve it.
task.description: The tome is guarded by a powerful creature. Be prepared for a difficult battle.

task.objective: Return the tome to Archmage Alora at the Council of Mages Tower.
task.description: Once you have the tome, return to Archmage Alora at the Council of Mages Tower. She will be grateful for your help.
